main_definition: causing or characterized by death; deadly, lethal.

meanings_and_examples.example: The accident had a fatal outcome for the driver.

meanings_and_examples.definition: gravely injurious or damaging to life
meanings_and_examples.example: Exposure to certain chemicals can have fatal health effects.

meanings_and_examples.definition: decisive in determining an outcome; critical
meanings_and_examples.example: The final round of the chess game was a fatal mistake for his opponent, leading him to lose.
Skiing without proper safety gear can be fatal.
